content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a function `ispersonal` that returns a trait if the provided Vehicle type is a personal vehicle for everyday driving. All vehicles are subtypes of AbstractVehicle. Function must work for types: Car, Motorcycle, Bus, Truck. The first two should return true, the latter two should return false . The function should default to false for any other subtype of AbstractVehicle. Provide an example.

Here's a possible implementation of `ispersonal` in Julia:

```julia
abstract Vehicle

struct Car <: Vehicle
end

struct Motorcycle <: Vehicle
end

struct Bus <: Vehicle
end

struct Truck <: Vehicle
end

function ispersonal(V::Vehicle) -> Bool
    # check if the vehicle type is one of the personal vehicle types.
    # Note that this function assumes that each personal vehicle type has a unique name, as specified in the table below:
| Personal Vehicle Type | Name |
|--------------------------------------|------|
| Sedan                                   | Toyota Camry |
| SUV                                         | Chevrolet Suburban |
| Luxury sedan                             | BMW 5 Series |
| Sports car                                       | Ferrari 488 GTB |
| Electric vehicle                            | Tesla Model S |

    # return true if the provided Vehicle type is one of the personal vehicle types, and false otherwise.
    # Note that this function assumes that each personal vehicle type has a unique name, as specified in the table above:
| Personal Vehicle Type | Name |
|--------------------------------------|------|
| Sedan                                   | Toyota Camry |
| SUV                                         | Chevrolet Suburban |
| Luxury sedan                             | BMW 5 Series |
| Sports car                                       | Ferrari 488 GTB |
| Electric vehicle                            | Tesla Model S |

| SUV                                         | Chevrolet Suburban |
| Luxury sedan                             | BMW 5 Series |
| Sports car                                       | Ferrari 488 GTB |
| Electric vehicle                            | Tesla Model S |
